titles: Proclamation, for apprehending Fergus Tempeltoun a murderer.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by the successors of Andrew Anderson, Printers to their most excellent Majesties,
notes: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the first day of February, and of Our Reign the fifth year, 1694.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
